name: TheWoodsman
description:
Team Name: 

Team Retrospection

Instructions

Proceed through the story to reach the end (an abrupt end on account of time restraints)

WASD for movement, mouse to look around. 

Left Click to interact with story boxes and to acquire new words in the environment

Right Click to cancel out of interfaces

Spacebar to jump

Shift to run

Playable on Windows 64 bit

List of Content that was created before the jam or gotten from the marketplace:

-rock meshes from Luos Modular Rocks and Cave pack by Luos

-Water plane and cliffs from Water Materials pack by tharlevfx

-All sounds acquired from Soundly app
